passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > form:nth-child(2) > fieldset:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

passes.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL

passes.help: Images must have alternate text
